submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        m = n // 2
        limit = [max(nums[i], k - nums[i], nums[n - 1 - i], k - nums[n - 1 - i]) for i in range(m)]  # 每一对数只操作一次能达到的最大差值
        diff = defaultdict(list)  # 按照当前差值分类的limit，升序排列
        for i in range(m):
            insort(diff[abs(nums[i] - nums[n - 1 - i])], limit[i])
        limit.sort()  # limit升序排列

        ans = maxsize
        # 目标差值位x
        for x in range(k + 1):
            temp = m + bisect_left(limit, x)  # 每一对都操作一次，最大差值小于x的要操作两次
            temp -= len(diff[x]) + bisect_left(diff[x], x)  # 差值已经为x的不用操作
            if temp < ans:
                ans = temp
        return ans
